sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useEffect, useRef } from 'react' import './App.css'; import { Route, Routes} from 'react-router-dom' import Main from './pages/Main'; import AboutUs from './pages/AboutUs'; import logo from './images/logo.jpg'; import title from './images/title.jpg'; import Texts from './Texts'; import {Context} from './Context'; function App() { const {lang, setLang} = useContext(Context); const texts = Texts[lang]; const container = useRef(); function changeLang(){ if (lang == 'ar'){ setLang('en') container.current.style.direction = 'ltr'; } else{ setLang('ar') container.current.style.direction = 'rtl'; } } return (

{texts.latestNews}

{texts.latestNewsContent}

{texts.mainMenu}

} /> } /> } />

{texts.identity}

{texts.contact}

); } export default App;
